Text.p: Sorry I didn't get to this earlier, but new Shopping Boxes have shown up in conjunction with te Safari Zone events.

FYI: I found a bug where a lot of Legacy info (most notably Move Sets) was not being included.
That is now fixed.

Article.Title: Changes to Field Research and Shiny Rosalia

Text.p:
With the Water Event concluded, the Event's Field Research tasks have discontinued. But surprisingly, the 7 tasks they "temporarily" changed, have disappeared instead of reverting.
The Field Research chart has been updated to reflect this.
(NOTE: Since I haven't been able to find a reliable source for rewards that are Items, I have removed them from the chart for now.)
Also, Snorlax is the current Encounter complete a Research Breakthrough. (When you complete 7 days of Research tasks.)

In other news, The shiny version of Rosalia has been released, and they have announced that Articuno will also be available as a shiny on 7 July.
The appropriate tables have been updated to show both.
(And I'll put the Articuno on the Raid Boss chart even though it won't be available until Saturday.)

The Alola form for several Pokemon has been released and there are more to come!
The various charts have been updated.

This morning it was announced that Regice will now be a Raid Boss!
I have updated the Raid Bosses Chart.
